Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

Who thinks Hollywood Narrator should 
leave the RPG? This poll lets you 
decide! Everyone's vote counts except 
for Dewboy's. I don't expect to win and 
show me no sympathy. Ready? Begin. 

  o Hollywood Narrator should stay 
  o Hollywood Narrator should leave 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/surveys?id=1005027  

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
